short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension for the Cue conversation platform

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Organizations and teams are constantly trying to adopt new systems to find efficiencies and improve workflows. 

With so many apps, plugins, and an ever changing business landscape, we knew a simple solution to streamline was needed. 

Cue is the virtual overlay, able to quickly sync with your existing processes and systems. It pushes and pulls content effortlessly between your apps, websites and forms, increasing productivity and communication for a better user experience. 

Cue: 
• Provides visual prompts to users 
• Guides conversations 
• Dynamically transfers data to multiple systems simultaneously
• Integrates complex multi-app workstreams
• Boosts team collaboration and improves training processes
• Simplifies the user journey and helps you own the narrative
• Adapts to your unique needs without any programming
• Improves workflow efficiencies 

Sales and Service representatives utilize Cue for:
• Scripted prompts for conversation flow guidance
• Easy access knowledge management tool for easier objection and critical questions
• Simple field input that automatically updates relevant fields in other systems without having to bounce around tabs, pages, or views

Sales and Service leaders utilize Cue to: 
• Train and onboard reps
• Gain insights into what is being said while on the phone 
• Automate processes that reps are used to having to do manually 
• Track adherence to compliance requirements 

Cue is great for organizations that need to rapidly onboard new callers, manage complicated data entry, or ensure call compliance.
